programme.title: The First 48 - Life Snatched
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 22 In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a middle-aged mother of four, shot to death in a random robbery outside a public storage facility.

programme.title: The First 48 - Silent Rage / Tainted Love
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 24 In Harris County, Deputy Jason Brown is called out on Easter Sunday to investigate the brutal shooting of a woman who was a school bus driver and mother of two. Meanwhile, Harris County Sergeant Sidney Miller takes on the murder of a young father.

programme.title: The First 48: Cut Down / 9-1-1 - Cut Down / 9-1-1
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 144 Det. Garcia is investigating the shooting death of a local homeless man. And after a minor injury, a woman makes a routine call to 911--the call becomes anything but routine when gunshots ring out in the background.

programme.title: The First 48: Body of Evidence - Body of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 146 When dismembered body parts are found floating in Miami's Biscayne Bay, Det. Orlando Silva and the Miami homicide team work around the clock to solve one of the most brutal murders South Florida has ever seen.

programme.title: The First 48 - Underworld
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 5 In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a man found brutally beaten to death below a major interstate.

programme.title: The First 48: Schoolyard Revenge - Schoolyard Revenge
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 157 A twenty-nine-year-old man and his paralyzed mother are shot to death in their apartment.

programme.title: Moalboal White Beach: Philippines - Moalboal White Beach: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring the Basdaku Beach in the Philippines.

programme.title: Diamond Beach II: Indonesia - Diamond Beach II: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, These shores and accompanying diamond-shaped cliffs are often compared to the idyllic beach scenes of postcards.

programme.title: Redwood Forest Rejuvenation - Redwood Forest Rejuvenation
programme.desc: Season 1, Transporting to the magical redwood forests of Northern California and soaking up the healing energies that only pure nature can provide, with multiple healing scenes from the old-grove forest, paired with real-life stereo nature sounds.

programme.title: Good Morning - Red Sand Beach, Hawaii, U.S.
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Energizing waves crash on the shores of Red Sand Beach, Hawaii.

programme.title: Above the Dolomites - Above the Dolomites
programme.desc: Season 1, Featuring cinematography by new collaborator Ryan Shirley and synchronized to new healing music by Antonio Resende; offering some views that showcase the Dolomites mountain range.

programme.title: Tutoko River: New Zealand - Tutoko River: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Rushing waters through rocky rapids.

programme.title: Tumalog & Aguinid Falls: Philippines - Tumalog & Aguinid Falls: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Starting the journey marveling at the cascading turquoise waters of Tumalog Falls, nestled amidst the lush forest and tropical foliage, and staying captivatingly thrilled by Aguinid Falls' multi-tiered rapids and unique rock formations.

programme.title: Autumn in Amsterdam - Autumn in Amsterdam
programme.desc: Season 1, A cityscape film captured by collaborating cinematographer and dutch resident Nick DeJonge.

programme.title: Islands of Paradise - Yasawa Islands, Fiji
programme.desc: Season 1, The beautiful Yasawa islands of Fiji.

programme.title: NatureVision TV - Tenorio Volcano National Park, Costa Rica
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 In the rainforest of Costa Rica's Tenorio Volcano National Park, admire waterfalls plunging into a cerulean lagoon.

programme.title: Star beach: Philippines - Star beach: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring a small and secluded tropical oasis with soft and white sandy beaches, crystal-clear waters and rugged rock formations.

programme.title: Falls Colors: Colorado - Falls Colors: Colorado
programme.desc: Season 1, Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland - Flying Over Iceland
programme.desc: Season 1, An aerial journey to the remote fjiords and valleys of eastern Iceland.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Ice Queen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 28 A homicidal vegan gelato maker gets her just desserts after two bodies are found in her freezer.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Mommie Dearest
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 A woman is bludgeoned to death in her own home, and her severely handicapped teenage daughter goes missing. When investigators eventually catch up with the young woman, they hear a baffling story of a mother's toxic love.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 36 In Florida, four bodies are found slaughtered in a factory. It is the largest mass murder in county history. Each victim is somehow connected to the factory and the family business.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - The Abbottsford Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 41 A Special Task Force hunts down a deadly stalker on the loose in small-town Abbotsford, where one teenaged girl is found brutally killed and another barely alive. Investigators try to decipher a series of taunting messages from the killer himself.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 6
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Here, the squad race to catch up with thieves in a stolen van, are forced to take drastic measures on the street, and help a pregnant woman escape a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 5
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A night shift depends into chaos for the cops, one officer is hit with racial abuse, and a member of the public destroys potential evidence.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Robert Ben Rhoades
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 14 Robert Ben Rhoades, aka the Truck Stop Killer, raped and tortured women in the back of his truck for over a decade from the mid-70s.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Anthony Arkwright
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 19 Anthony Arkwright slaughtered his grandparents before murdering and mutilating two neighbours in a rampage over a four-day period in 1988.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - William Bonin
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 William Bonin is known to some as the 'Freeway Killer,' thought to have raped, tortured and murdered a minimum of twenty-one boys and young men before he was executed in 1996.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Stephen Farrow
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Stephen Farrow committed two murders in early 2012 motivated by an obsessive hatred of Christianity, which he attributed to sexual abuse from a priest.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Danced with Death
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 223 The story of Shamaia Smith, how she met her death and how relentless detective work and modern forensics solved the mystery of what happened to her.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Wood Chipper Murder
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 224 The story of Helle Craft’s savage murder, the horrific disposal of her body and how an exhaustive police and forensics investigation caught up with her killer and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Triple Murder in Pinyon Pines
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 225 The story of 3 innocent victims whose lives were ended violently and abruptly, how the culprits almost got away and how determined detective work and forensic advancements solved the case.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Deadly Disposal
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 226 The story of the disappearance and murder of Jeffrey and Jeanette Navin and how tenacious investigators and extensive forensics eventually solved the mystery and brought their killers to justice.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Schisms
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 Commander Riker's inability to fall asleep begins to show in other members of the crew in other forms, putting the Enterprise on the trail of a mystery.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - True Q
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 When an honor student in the medical field is assigned to the Enterprise in an internship manner, she begins to demonstrate powers of the Q, prompting you-know-who to show up.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Rascals
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 An emergency beam out renders four crewmen down to childhood shortly before renegade Ferengi take over the Enterprise and offload the adults.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - A Fistful of Datas
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 A Holodeck fantasy goes awry, sending Worf and his son into a Wild West showdown with a villain who's a dead ringer for Data.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Quality of Life
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 Data risks Picard and Geordi's lives in order to protect another living machine.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Chain of Command (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 After resigning his command to participate in a dangerous secret mission, Captain Picard is taken hostage by the Cardassians.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Chain of Command (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 11 While under the command of an unfeeling new captain, the Enterprise attempts to rescue Picard from the Cardassians.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Ship in a Bottle
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 12 A calculating Sherlock Holmesian character traps Picard and others in a holodeck simulation.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Aquiel
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 13 Geordi is enamored with a beautiful and mysterious Starfleet lieutenant accused of murder.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Face of the Enemy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 14 Forced to impersonate a Romulan Intelligence official, Counselor Troi becomes a pivotal part of an elaborate defection scheme.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Tapestry
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 After Picard loses his life in a surprise attack, Q gives him the chance to change his destiny.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Birthright (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 Worf and Data embark on unusual journeys to seek out their fathers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Birthright (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 In seeking his father, Worf discovers a prisoner-of-war camp that has evolved into a Klingon/Romulan haven - an Eden where Worf becomes their serpent.

programme.title: Day The World Ended - Day The World Ended
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In a post-apocalyptic world after an atomic war, seven disparate people find themselves in a protected valley in the home of a survivalist and his beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Area 51 - Area 51
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's top secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes horrifying, unimaginable secrets.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Deliverance
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 14 MacLeod arrives in France, leaving a trail of hate and destruction in his wake.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Promises
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 Kassim, an Immortal to whom Duncan made a promise, demands that MacLeod assassinate a tyrannical dictator of a Middle Eastern country.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Methuselah's Gift
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 When masked thugs try to take Amanda's head and steal the crystal given to her long ago by Rebecca, Amanda and MacLeod investigate.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Lateness of the Hour
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 The daughter of an inventor objects to their 'perfect' home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Trouble with Templeton
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Most Unusual Camera
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 When three dum-dum crooks get ahold of a camera that takes pictures of the future, they set out to make a quick fortune with their new toy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Night of the Meek
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 After a derelict Santa Claus is fired on Christmas Eve, he finds a mysterious bag that gives out presents. With this bag, he sets out to fulfill his one wish - to see the less fortunate inherit the bounties of Christmas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Dust
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 In a tragic, western town, a desperate father begs for clemency as his son is slated to die for an accident he could not have prevented.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Back There
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 At a prominent club in Washington, D.C., a socialite argues about whether it would be possible to change history by traveling back in time. When he leaves the club he finds himself in 1865, on the night that President Lincoln will be shot.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Whole Truth
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 A used car salesman buys a car that dooms him to tell only the truth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Invaders
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 When a woman investigates a clamor on the roof of her rural house, she discovers a small UFO and little aliens emerging from it. Or so it seems.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E1 - Premiere
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Astronaut John Crichton attempts to propel his module at high speeds but is hit by a radiation wave and is sucked through a wormhole.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E2 - Exodus From Genesis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A locator beacon, automatically broadcasting its exact location to any Peacekeeper forces in the area.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E3 - Back And Back And Back To The Future
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 The crew rescues a scientist and his assistant from a disintegrating ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Warhead
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 25 An alien weapon that possesses artificial intelligence begins to terrorize the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Equinox, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 26 Another Federation starship in the Delta Quadrant brings trouble for Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Equinox, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 Starfleet's honor is tested when two captains fight a battle of wills.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Survival Instinct
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 2 Visitors from the past present Seven with an opportunity to right a wrong.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Barge Of The Dead
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 B'Elanna struggles with questions of the afterlife and her Klingon heritage.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tinker, Tenor, Doctor, Spy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 The Doctor's overactive imagination leads Voyager into real trouble.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alice
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 Tom's latest shuttle acquisition blurs the line between man and machine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Riddles
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 The crew discovers a new side of Tuvok when an enemy attack leaves him stripped of his Vulcan sensibilities.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Dragon's Teeth
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Mysterious corridors in space lead to the discovery of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - One Small Step
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 A subspace anomaly leads to the discovery of a 21st-century space shuttle lost on a mission to Mars.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Voyager Conspiracy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 Seven uncovers a conspiracy to keep Voyager stranded in the Delta Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Pathfinder
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 Barclay uses holograms to formulate a plan to open communications with Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fair Haven
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 11 Janeway's holographic love interest becomes more than just a way to pass the time.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 14
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 14 This episode includes: Missing Page, Pts. 1 & 2, KC Blast & UD, Fugitive Squirrel and Brief Encounter.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 17
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 17 This episode includes: Noreen Renier & UD, Missing Newborn, Gigi's Amnesia & UD and Unknown Dad & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 This episode includes: Halloween Party Death, Father/Son & UD, Priest Killer and Rock of Fortune.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 15

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: MST3K: Robot Wars - MST3K: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

programme.title: MST3K: Beyond Atlantis - MST3K: Beyond Atlantis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).

programme.title: MST3K: Munchie - MST3K: Munchie
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch as a child befriends MUNCHIE (1992). Jonah refuses to go back into the theater and suffers the consequences.

programme.title: MST3K: Doctor Mordrid - MST3K: Doctor Mordrid
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.

programme.title: MST3K: Demon Squad - MST3K: Demon Squad
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger - MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.

programme.title: MST3K - MST3K
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Cupid & Cate - Cupid & Cate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mary-Louise Parker stars as a vibrant young woman who breaks off an uninspired relationship when she falls for a witty and kind young lawyer. Also stars Peter Gallagher and Bebe Neuwirth. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Loving Leah - Loving Leah
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.

programme.title: A Wish Come True - A Wish Come True
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A down-on-her-luck birthday girl suddenly receives everything she ever wished for, only to realize the happy life she wanted was right in front of her all along. Stars Megan Park, Benjamin Hollingsworth and Dean Cain.

programme.title: All Yours - All Yours
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

programme.title: Be My Valentine - Be My Valentine
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Daniel Farrell is a young widowed father who is navigating mourning and parenting an adolescent son. While teaching his son the ropes on dating, Daniel discovers he too has many things to figure out about love.

programme.title: How to Fall in Love - How to Fall in Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Still suffering from the ugly-duckling syndrome, Harold White hires Annie Hayes--a crush from high school--to be his dating coach. All bets are off when sparks fly between "student" and "teacher."

programme.title: The Locket - The Locket
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After his mother dies, a college dropout befriends a patient at a health-care center who gives him support and guidance. Stars Vanessa Redgrave. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: A Place for Annie - A Place for Annie
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sissy Spacek stars as a caring nurse who adopts an HIV positive baby but must fight prejudice and the natural mother who wants custody. Also stars Mary-Louise Parker and Joan Plowright. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Tracker
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - First Contact
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Outsiders
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Common Descent
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Epilogue
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Blockade
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Gauntlet
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Lockdown
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 3 When Jackson contracts a mysterious illness, O'Neill is convinced that a contagion has infected the base and orders a lockdown. But when Jackson reveals that he was actually possessed by Anubis, O'Neill must discover the identity of the new host!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Zero Hour
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 4 O'Neill deals with a visit from the president and negotiations between two warring tribes from Amra. When SG-1 is captured, he's forced to choose between the safety of the team and the fate of a planet, making him question his competency!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Icon
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 5 On a distant planet the Stargate has become a symbol to the people, and some believe that the gods will return through it to reward the faithful. SG-1 realizes that those gods are the Goa'uld and warn of the danger they may face.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Avatar
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 6 The team agrees that an easy VR simulator is a useless training tool against the Goa'uld. Teal'c lets it learn from him, but as he plays, the game sends a shock each time he dies, and if he doesn't defeat the game, the chair will kill him.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Affinity
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 7 Teal'c, having finally been cleared to live off-base, settles into his new neighborhood. His neighbors love him. He's quiet and he has become a sort of protector of his community but not everybody is as pleased about Teal'c's civilian assimilation.
